thread.title: Baby Cries Beethoven Moonlight Sonata Viral Video
thread.title_full: Baby Cries Beethoven Moonlight Sonata Viral Video

author: Fox News Insider
title: Baby Cries Beethoven Moonlight Sonata Viral Video
text:
TONIGHT on Fox News: Milo Yiannopoulos joins Tucker at 9pm ET, followed by VP Mike Pence on "Hannity" at 10pm ET. Moved by the Music? Baby's Tearful Reaction to Beethoven Goes Viral // Beethoven 
A video showing a two-year-old boy crying upon hearing Beethoven's "Moonlight Sonata" for the first time has gone viral. 
The boy, Tyler, was attending his sister's piano recital when he began to tear up while listening to the music. 
The video was posted on YouTube by the boy's father, Josh Noftz, in November but has resurfaced in recent days. 
What do you think of this adorable reaction? Watch the above video, and tell us your thoughts in the comments section. Subscribe
